title: Clarity
description: As part of Caleb's punishment, he hasn't been allowed to hunt or feed for months. It's been difficult to ignore his most basic vampire instincts, but he feels he's made progress and is ready for his punishment to be over. When his vampire Master finally allows Caleb his freedom, Caleb's got his fangs set on one person -- Xander, his werewolf lover.
author: Jourdan Lane
